Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound  Reroute near 47th/Archer
ShortDescription: Eastbound  #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Archer, Kedzie and 47th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Archer, Kedzie and 47th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Archer.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
